name: @dubizzle/cz-conventional-changelog-for-any
description: Commitizen adapter following the conventional-changelog format, forked from https://github.com/digitalroute/cz-conventional-changelog-for-jira.

scripts.add-dependencies: npm add boxen@5 chalk commitizen lodash.map longest right-pad word-wrap && npm add -D @types/chai @types/mocha chai cosmiconfig cz-conventional-changelog mocha mock-require prettier standard-version && npm add -O @commitlint/load
scripts.remove-dependencies: npm remove boxen chalk commitizen lodash.map longest right-pad word-wrap && npm remove @types/chai @types/mocha chai cosmiconfig cz-conventional-changelog mocha mock-require prettier standard-version && npm remove @commitlint/load
scripts.update-dependencies: npm run remove-dependencies && npm run add-dependencies

author: Marcus Johansson <polarn@gmail.com>
